classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
"Roberge's Used Robot (RUR) : a Python Learning Environment" is a Python
implementation of a "robot environment" as introduced by R. Pattis in 1981. RUR
is similar in spirit to Guido van Robot (GvR), although it uses Python syntax.
It also includes a Python shell.
info.name: RUR-PLE
info.html_description: “Roberge’s Used Robot (RUR) : a Python Learning Environment” is a Python implementation of a “robot environment” as introduced by R. Pattis in 1981. RUR is similar in spirit to Guido van Robot (GvR), although it uses Python syntax. It also includes a Python shell.
